DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare determine efficacy minimal stimulation clomiphene citrate ( CC ) first-line treatment infertile woman Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Minimal Stimulation Clomiphene Citrate Treatment Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: All patient receive 100 mg CC ( ClomidÂ® ; Global Napi Pharmaceuticals , Cairo , Egypt ) 5 day start day 3 spontaneous induce menstruation . In group A ( minimal stimulation ) , 2 vial highly purified uFSH , 150 IU ( Fostimon ; IBSA , Lugano , Switzerland , 75 IU/vial ) give IM cycle day 9 . A total 3 cycle offer group .
DOC.criteria: PCOS No infertility factor No previous use ovarian stimulation drug Congenital adrenal hyperplasia Cushing syndrome Androgen secreting tumor
